wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Smalley (13 January 1912 – 1 April 1984), often known as Tom Smalley, was an English professional footballer who played as a half-back for Wolverhampton Wanderers and Norwich City before the Second World War and for Northampton Town in the post-war period, making a total of over 420 appearances for the three clubs. He also made one appearance for England in 1936.
